overview_of_class: An introductory course designed to present students with an overview of the phonology, phonetics, morphology, syntax and sociolinguistic and pragmatic elements specific to the Spanish language.
name: Introduction to Spanish Linguistics
title: WCAS SPANISH 280-0-20 Introduction to Spanish Linguistics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An introductory course designed to present students with an overview of the phonology, phonetics, morphology, syntax and sociolinguistic and pragmatic elements specific to the Spanish language.

subject: SPANISH
